text: José Ismael Díaz (died 1976) was a Salvadoran footballer. ==Club career== Nicknamed el Cisco, Díaz played for C.D. Dragón before joining the Juan Francisco Barraza-managed Águila.EL KINDER DE BARRAZA - Águila Online ==International career== Díaz played for his country's Olympic team in the 1972 and 1976 qualifiersEl Salvador en Juegos Olimpicos El Balón Cuscatleco and represented El Salvador in 3 FIFA World Cup qualification matches ==Death== In 1976, Díaz was murdered in San Miguel,Perdió el fútbol La Prensa Grafica Mareros asesinan a entrenador-Tragedias del fútbol El Diario de Hoy while working in his taxi.La violencia se cobra la vida de otro futbolista - La Prensa Gráfica ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1976 deaths Category:People from San Miguel, El Salvador Category:Association football forwards Category:Salvadoran footballers Category:El Salvador international footballers Category:C.D. Águila footballers Category:Male murder victims Category:Murdered footballers Category:People murdered in El Salvador Category:Salvadoran murder victims Category:1976 crimes in El Salvador Category:1976 murders in North America Category:1970s murders in El Salvador
title: Ismael Díaz (Salvadoran footballer)
